Description: Rectangular sandstone funerary stela of the monk Georgios; eight lines of Coptic text.
Curator's comments: from Aswan? (Munier 1931, 266); Bowring acquisition rejected by Bierbrier (1994, 66, pl.12b).
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (5, pl.6.2)
Bierbrier 1994 / Provenances gained and lost (66, pl.12b) (Bowring acquisition rejected.)
Munier 1930 / Les stèles coptes du monastère de Saint-Simeon (266 (no.6)) (edition and translation, attributed to Aswan on internal evidence)
Revillout 1885 / Les prières pour les morts dans l’épigraphie égyptienne (12-13 (no.17))
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Synopsis 1848 / Synopsis of the Contents of the British Museum (p.192) ("From the collection of the Earl of Belmore.")
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 6:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: SB Kopt. I 503 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
